Package com.example.Fiszki.flashcards

Class FlashcardController

java.lang.Object
com.example.Fiszki.flashcards.FlashcardController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/flashcards/") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") public class FlashcardController extends Object
Controller for handling flashcard-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addFlashcard

      @PostMapping("/add-flashcard") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addFlashcard(@RequestBody FlashcardAddRequest request)
      Endpoint for adding a new flashcard.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing flashcard information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added flashcard or an error response.

    • editFlashcard

      @PutMapping("/edit/{flashcardsId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FlashcardInfoResponse> editFlashcard(@PathVariable Integer flashcardsId, @RequestBody FlashcardAddRequest request)
      Endpoint for editing an existing flashcard.
      Parameters:
      flashcardsId - The ID of the flashcard to be edited.
      request - The request containing updated flashcard information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the edit response or an error response.

    • showFlashcard

      @GetMapping("/show/{flashcardsId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> showFlashcard(@PathVariable Integer flashcardsId)
      Endpoint for showing a flashcard by its ID.
      Parameters:
      flashcardsId - The ID of the flashcard to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the flashcard or an error response.

    • deleteFlashcardById

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{flashcardId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FlashcardInfoResponse> deleteFlashcardById(@PathVariable Integer flashcardId)
      Endpoint for deleting a flashcard by its ID.
      Parameters:
      flashcardId - The ID of the flashcard to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the delete response or an error response.

    • showFlashcardsByCategory

      @GetMapping("/category/{category}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> showFlashcardsByCategory(@PathVariable String category)
      Endpoint for showing flashcards by category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of flashcards to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of flashcards or an error response.

    • showFlashcardsByCategoryWithLimit

      @PostMapping("/category-limit/{category}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> showFlashcardsByCategoryWithLimit(@RequestBody FlashcardCategoryLimitRequest request, @PathVariable String category)
      Endpoint for showing flashcards by category with a limit.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing the category limit.
      category - The category of flashcards to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of flashcards or an error response.

      @GetMapping("/collection/{nameCollection}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> showCollectionByName(@PathVariable String nameCollection)
      Endpoint for showing flashcards in a specific collection by name.
      Parameters:
      nameCollection - The name of the flashcard collection.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of flashcards or an error response.

      Endpoint for deleting a flashcard collection by name.
      Parameters:
      nameCollection - The name of the flashcard collection to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the delete response or an error response.

      Endpoint for adding a new flashcard collection.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing the collection name.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added collection or an error response.
